thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com
thread.title: Domenico Damiano Munno
thread.title_full: Spotahome evaluado por Domenico Damiano Munno

author: Domenico Damiano Munno
title: Domenico Damiano Munno
text: I love spotahome because you are always sure of what you are booking. You have all the details you need when searching for a new home and they even provide video and draws of the apartment. I use it because when you book here you can be sure you will find a quality room.
